mapper.select: SELECT DISPOSAL_FREEZE_RESULT_UUID AS disposalFreezeResultUuid, DISPOSAL_FREEZE_EVENT_UUID AS disposalFreezeEventUuid, DISPOSAL_FREEZE_DEGREE_UUID AS disposalFreezeDegreeUuid, AGGREGATION_ID AS aggregationId, ITEM_UUID AS itemUuid, STATUS_UUID AS statusUuid, DESCRIPTION AS description, NOTES AS notes, FREEZED_DATE AS freezedDate, TERMINATOR_UUID AS terminatorUuid, END_DATE AS endDate, INSERT_UUID AS insertUuid, INSERT_DATE AS insertDate, UPDATE_UUID AS updateUuid, UPDATE_DATE AS updateDate FROM DF_DISPOSAL_FREEZE_RESULT

SELECT DISPOSAL_FREEZE_RESULT_UUID AS disposalFreezeResultUuid, DISPOSAL_FREEZE_EVENT_UUID AS disposalFreezeEventUuid, DISPOSAL_FREEZE_DEGREE_UUID AS disposalFreezeDegreeUuid, AGGREGATION_ID AS aggregationId, ITEM_UUID AS itemUuid, STATUS_UUID AS statusUuid, DESCRIPTION AS description, NOTES AS notes, FREEZED_DATE AS freezedDate, TERMINATOR_UUID AS terminatorUuid, END_DATE AS endDate, INSERT_UUID AS insertUuid, INSERT_DATE AS insertDate, UPDATE_UUID AS updateUuid, UPDATE_DATE AS updateDate FROM DF_DISPOSAL_FREEZE_RESULT WHERE DISPOSAL_FREEZE_RESULT_UUID = #{disposalFreezeResultUuid}
mapper.update: UPDATE DF_DISPOSAL_FREEZE_RESULT SET DISPOSAL_FREEZE_EVENT_UUID = #{disposalFreezeEventUuid}, DISPOSAL_FREEZE_DEGREE_UUID = #{disposalFreezeDegreeUuid}, AGGREGATION_ID = #{aggregationId}, ITEM_UUID = #{itemUuid}, STATUS_UUID = #{statusUuid}, DESCRIPTION = #{description}, NOTES = #{notes}, FREEZED_DATE = #{freezedDate}, TERMINATOR_UUID = #{terminatorUuid}, END_DATE = #{endDate}, INSERT_UUID = #{insertUuid}, INSERT_DATE = #{insertDate}, UPDATE_UUID = #{updateUuid}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate} WHERE DISPOSAL_FREEZE_RESULT_UUID = #{disposalFreezeResultUuid}

INSERT INTO DF_DISPOSAL_FREEZE_RESULT ( DISPOSAL_FREEZE_RESULT_UUID, DISPOSAL_FREEZE_EVENT_UUID, DISPOSAL_FREEZE_DEGREE_UUID, AGGREGATION_ID, ITEM_UUID, STATUS_UUID, DESCRIPTION, NOTES, FREEZED_DATE, TERMINATOR_UUID, END_DATE, INSERT_UUID, INSERT_DATE, UPDATE_UUID, UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{disposalFreezeResultUuid}, #{disposalFreezeEventUuid}, #{disposalFreezeDegreeUuid}, #{aggregationId}, #{itemUuid}, #{statusUuid}, #{description}, #{notes}, #{freezedDate}, #{terminatorUuid}, #{endDate}, #{insertUuid}, #{insertDate}, #{updateUuid}, #{updateDate} )
